name: Military Jeep Parking

Thus, your mind and your reflexes can increase their skills, whether the steering wheel ...

It's not just 3D modeling and parking; no, it's just a new driving experience, to see if you got what it takes to go to serve your country! Are you willing to do the job! One of the biggest challenges is not required constant gas pressure.
I was a soldier who works and manages the army vehicles as a way to combat support, combat support and combat service, day and night, in all forms of ways according to the requirements, and perform various goods, including goods and people and dangerous goods
So you've got what it takes to be the driver of the army, and you can control everything we throw at you! Have fun and enjoy this latest simulation machine Garden. Enjoy a variety of 3D levels and be smart in motion through the parking lot of the missions.
